result.reason: Allows users to search for text within the scrollback buffer of active terminal sessions (SSH/Telnet/etc.), a standard feature in modern terminal emulators.
result.approach: Create a 'Find' dialog in the main UI that triggers a search in the active connection. For PuTTY sessions, this may require modifying the embedded PuTTYNG to accept a search command or implementing a workaround that copies the buffer to memory for searching.
